description: Detects Commandlet that is used to export certificates from the local certificate store and sometimes used by threat actors to steal private keys from compromised machines Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Legitimate certificate exports invoked by administrators or users (depends on processes in the environment - filter if unusable)
name: Suspicious Export-PfxCertificate
